thread.title: Jennifer Lawrence Is Strong Enough to Give Aziz Ansari Piggyback Ride After 'SNL' Party
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lawrence Is Strong Enough to Give Aziz Ansari Piggyback Ride After 'SNL' Party

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jennifer Lawrence Is Strong Enough to Give Aziz Ansari Piggyback Ride After 'SNL' Party
text:
Comments The Oscar-winning actress gave Aziz a piggyback ride to his car as they left the Wayfarer Restaurant in New York on Saturday, October 10. 
Jennifer Lawrence showed off her strong bond with Aziz Ansari . The Oscar-winning actress gave Aziz a piggyback ride to his car as they left the " Saturday Night Live " after-party venue at the Wayfarer Restaurant in New York on Saturday, October 10. The blonde beauty was photographed wearing a gray turtleneck crop top featuring long sleeves. Jennifer flaunted her toned tummy as she wore low-waisted trousers. She completed her look with black heel sandals. Aziz, meanwhile, wore a white shirt topped with leather jacket. He donned black jeans and brown blucher shoes. Jennifer Lawrence leaving the SNL After Party last night with Aziz Ansari! pic.twitter.com/s0Hx0gZS4j — Jennifer Lawrence (@JLdaily) 11 Oktober 2015 In photos posted by Jennifer's fan's Twitter account, the two were all smiles. Aziz held on Jennifer's shoulders tightly while the actress was holding up his thighs. The 25-year-old actress was seemingly excited to show off her physical strength. Her heels didn't even slow her down. While Jennifer didn't mind being photographed by paparazzi, Aziz attempted to look away from the cameras. More pictures of Jennifer Lawrence with Aziz Ansari in New York last night! pic.twitter.com/t7Ok5TrtKP — Jennifer Lawrence (@JLdaily) 11 Oktober 2015 Earlier this month, the two had fun together alongside pal Amy Schumer . In a video posted on the " Trainwreck " actress' Instagram page, Aziz gave a very loud wakeup call for Amy's sister Kim Caramele. "This morning @azizansari and Jen woke up an angel #sleepmanager," Amy captioned the video.
